name: Out For Too Long - GAME 310 - Final Game
name_original: Out For Too Long - GAME 310 - Final Game
description:
Controls:

W A S D - Move

Move Mouse -> Move Camera

Space Bar - Jump

Right Click - Crouches when not moving, hold the button to continue crouching. Crouch while moving to slide.

Long jump by jumping while crouching or sliding.

Middle Mouse Button - Interact when you see a '?'

Q - Pauses and Unpauses the game
